quizDescription: Test your knowledge of famous quotes from popular movies.

questions.question: Which movie features the quote: 'Here's looking at you, kid.'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'Here's looking at you, kid.' is from the movie 'Casablanca,' spoken by the character Rick Blaine, played by Humphrey Bogart.

questions.question: In which movie does the character Forrest Gump say, 'Life is like a box of chocolates: you never know what you're gonna get.'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'Life is like a box of chocolates: you never know what you're gonna get.' is from the movie 'Forrest Gump,' spoken by the title character, Forrest Gump, portrayed by Tom Hanks.

questions.question: Which movie features the quote: 'May the Force be with you.'?
questions.explanation: The iconic phrase 'May the Force be with you.' is associated with the 'Star Wars' franchise, spoken by various characters throughout the series.

questions.question: Which movie includes the quote: 'You can't handle the truth!'?
questions.explanation: The memorable line 'You can't handle the truth!' is from the movie 'A Few Good Men,' delivered by Colonel Nathan R. Jessup, played by Jack Nicholson.

questions.question: In which film does the character Tony Montana say, 'Say hello to my little friend!'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'Say hello to my little friend!' is from the movie 'Scarface,' spoken by the character Tony Montana, portrayed by Al Pacino.

questions.question: Which movie features the quote: 'There's no place like home.'?
questions.explanation: The iconic line 'There's no place like home.' is from the classic film 'The Wizard of Oz,' uttered by the character Dorothy, played by Judy Garland.

questions.question: In which movie does the character Darth Vader say, 'I am your father.'?
options: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
questions.explanation: The iconic revelation 'I am your father.' is from the movie 'Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back,' spoken by Darth Vader.

questions.question: Which movie includes the quote: 'You had me at 'hello.''?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'You had me at 'hello.'' is from the movie 'Jerry Maguire,' spoken by the character Dorothy Boyd, played by Ren√©e Zellweger.

questions.question: Which film features the quote: 'I'll be back.'?
questions.explanation: The iconic phrase 'I'll be back.' is from the movie 'The Terminator,' spoken by the Terminator, portrayed by Arnold Schwarzenegger.

questions.question: In which movie does the character Jack Dawson say, 'I'm the king of the world!'?
options: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
questions.explanation: The memorable line 'I'm the king of the world!' is from the movie 'The Titanic,' spoken by Jack Dawson, portrayed by Leonardo DiCaprio.
